name: virtualspirits chatbot
author: VirtualSpirits

sections.description:
Create a Chatbot for your Website with VirtualSpirits. Chatbot Templates for Lead Generation, Customer Service, Ecommerce and Sales. Platform includes Chatbot, LiveChat, Web control panel, integrations and more. 30 Days Free Trial.

Requirements

The Chatbot plugin for WordPress is free but you’ll need a VirtualSpirits Chatbot account. You can create an account and try it for free for 30 days. No credit card required.

Create a Chatbot account from Here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder /virtualspirits-chatbot/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure your VirtualSpirits in Menu page
sections.faq:
Installation guide

Our installation guide for the WordPress plugin can be found here

Do you offer a free trial?

Yes, when you create an account you get 30 days of free trial. The trial has unlimited #visitors so you can test real traffic and real results. If your website is still in development than send us an email and we will extend the trial period until you can test real trafic.

Is there a limit to the number of conversations the chatbot can handle?

No, your chatbot can handle any number of chats at the same time.

Can I use the same Chatbot on multiple websites?

Yes, you can add the same chatbot account on multiple domains and websites.

Which languages are supported?

Our chatbot is available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Russian, German, Dutch, Hebrew, Arabic, Italian … Visit our website to create an account in your language.

Learn more about VirtualSpirits Chatbot

Visit our website to learn more and chat with us if you have any questions.
